A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Guess what critics - I'm not a 'bot' - and I didn't like this movie. It was enjoyable enough sure - but that was more because of the company I was with when I watched it in the cinema. 

The movie itself is a big f' you to Star Wars. 

The writing is piss poor - with plot holes galore\, contrived character interactions\, and just down right stupid. The world's internal consistency is thrown out the window for easy 'wow' moments - which just come across as ridiculous and disrespectful. 

And if people thought Ray was a Mary Sue in Force Awakens - she's basically a God in this one. 

And the worst thing? I am no longer looking forward to the next Star Wars film - you've done the unthinkable Disney and Kathleen Kennedy - you've killed any  'new hope' we may have had for future Star Wars movies.
